name: Spa Toscana at Peppermill
description: Rated 3rd best hotel spa in the nation by USA TODAY 10Best, Spa Toscana is a 33,000 sq. ft. sanctuary of luxury featuring 24 treatment rooms, Gentlemen and Ladies Ritual rooms with hot and cold plunge pools, cascading deluge showers, eucalyptus steam and cedar wood saunas, and Northern Nevada's only Caldarium with indoor pool. High-definition plasma TVs with SoSound acoustic resonance therapy complete the sensory experience.
shortDescription: USA TODAY's 3rd best hotel spa in the nation — 33,000 sq. ft. at Peppermill Resort Reno.
highlights: USA TODAY Top 3 Hotel Spa Nationally

faqs.question: How big is Spa Toscana?
faqs.answer: 33,000 sq. ft. with 24 treatment rooms, Caldarium, hot and cold plunge pools, steam rooms, and cedar saunas.

faqs.question: Can Golf the High Sierra include Spa Toscana in a golf package?
faqs.answer: Yes — we can build spa-and-golf packages combining tee times, Peppermill lodging, and Spa Toscana treatments.

testimonials.quote: Spa Toscana is legitimately one of the best spas I've ever visited. The Caldarium alone is worth the trip. GTHS included it in our golf package perfectly.
testimonials.author: Jennifer K.

testimonials.quote: USA TODAY doesn't lie — top 3 in the nation. The ritual rooms with plunge pools are incredible. Perfect recovery after 18 holes.
testimonials.author: Lisa H.
